name: Phantom Freeride
description:
High octane racing with a twist! Make use of your previous runs by switching your car to the ghosts of your former attempts. Dodge the enemies out to get you and race the fastest time possible!

Made in 72 hours for the Wowie Jam 3.0

Controls:
W - Accelerate
A/D - Stear
S - Reverse
Shift - Break
Space - Nitro
Right Click - Grapple
M - Mute Music
Esc - Main Menu

Fonts:
Title: https://www.1001fonts.com/ethnocentric-font.html
Timer/Main: https://www.1001freefonts.com/audiowide.font

Art:
Car Reference: https://pixabay.com/vectors/racing-car-ferrari-red-top-view-296772/

Glass Break: https://freesound.org/people/wjl/sounds/267889/
Engine: https://freesound.org/people/alegemaate/sounds/413658/
